RegisterInfo.name: Revision Control Register

Bits.desc: major revision id. Format is major(3:0).minor(3:0)
minor revision id. Format is major(3:0).minor(3:0)

RegisterInfo.name: LRCLK selection for both ADC and DAC Path

Bits.desc: I2S Data rate for both I2S Interface 1 (Audio)
I2S Data rate for both I2S Interface 2 (Voice)
I2S Data rate for both I2S Interface 3 (Aux)
I2S Data rate for both I2S Interface 4 (Hifi)
I2S Data rate for internal DSP operation

RegisterInfo.name: Configuration of Audio I2S/PCM interface for both DAC and ADC Path

Bits.desc: I2S start posisition
I2S1 LRCLK width
Audio interface mode selection
Data length selection per channel (i.e. NBIT)
ADC/DAC data left/right swap
I2S/PCM bclk polarity control
PCM Mode Select
Main serial data port mode selection (I2S or PCM)
Invert I2S1 LRCLK
Selects if MSB appears first or LSB appears first in I2S/PCM interface
Enabled I2S Audio Generator (ADC side), effective after write apply_changes
Enabled I2S Audio Receiver (DAC side), effective after write apply_changes

RegisterInfo.name: Configuration of I2S/PCM interface for both DAC and ADC Path

Audio interface mode selection

Invert LRCLK2
Selects if MSB appears first or LSB appears first in I2S/PCM interface
Enabled I2S Voice Generator (ADC side), effective after write apply_changes
Enabled I2S Voice Receiver (DAC side), effective after write apply_changes

pcm high phase width selection
I2S_DOUT pin behavior

Enabled I2S Aux Receiver (DAC side), effective after write apply_changes

RegisterInfo.name: oflag from mac and alu engines

Bits.desc: Use to clear latching high register in DEI2S ADC FIFO. active high
Use to clear latching high register in DEI2S DAC FIFO. active high
ADC I2S FIFO overflor flag
ADC I2S FIFO empty status bit (active high). It can only be cleared when 1 is written into adc_fifO_status_clr bit.
ADC I2S FIFO full status bit (active high). It can only be cleared when a 1 is written into adc_fifo_status_clr bit.
DAC I2S FIFO empty status bit (active high). It can only be cleared when a 1 is written into dac_fifo_staus_clr bit.
DAC I2S FIFO full status bit (active high). It can only be cleared when a 1 is written into dac_fifo_status_clr bit.
DAC I2S FIFO overflor flag
Overflow flag from DAC Path DSP1
Overflow flag from DAC Path DSP2
Overflow flag from ADC Path DSP1A
Overflow flag from DAC Path ALU1
Overflow flag from DAC Path ALU2
Overflow flag from ADC Path ALU1A

RegisterInfo.name: Configuration parameters for top fsm operation

Bits.desc: DEI2S Reset
I2S Hifi Reset
I2S Aux Reset
I2S Voice Reset
I2S Audio Reset
ASRC4 Reset
ASRC3 Reset
ASRC2 Reset
ASRC1 Reset
DSP1A Reset
DSP2 Reset
DSP1 Reset
Enable or disable all clocks
Synchronous reset of the digital audio module, i.e. datapath is cleared with clock still running. Active LOW reset.
Global entire chip active low reset.

Bits.desc: WTC of memories
RTC of memories

RegisterInfo.name: Configuration of I2S outputs for stereo and mono data
Dynamic ASRC Ratio adjust enable
TDM Control Register1

Bits.desc: TDM enable
TDM is master or slave mode
TDM fifo bypass
TDM mount fifo enable
TDM delay mode setting
TDM double edge mode enable
TDM apply the ckg configuration
TDM apply the configuration
TDM slot size, applied with apply_tdm_conf
Number of bclk between two slots (0-7), (1-8) in double edge mode, applied with apply_tdm_conf
Max number of slots that can be allocated on the bus (0-12), After the last slot, the bclk is stopped. Not used if set to 0. Applied with apply_ckg_conf
Number of bclk between fsyn edge and the first slot (12-0), 0 cannot be used in double edge (automatically set 1), Applied with apply_tdm_conf

RegisterInfo.name: TDM Control Register2

Bits.desc: First slot used by output channel x (0-12), applied with apply_tdm_conf

RegisterInfo.name: TDM Control Register3

Bits.desc: Second slot used by output channel x (0-12), applied with apply_tdm_conf

RegisterInfo.name: TDM Control Register4

Bits.desc: Slot used by input channel x in sdi (8-12)

RegisterInfo.name: TDM Control Register5

Bits.desc: Slot used by input channel x in sdi (0-7)

RegisterInfo.name: TDM Control Register6

Bits.desc: Data length of output channel (0-5), applied with apply_tdm_conf

RegisterInfo.name: TDM Control Register7

Bits.desc: Data length of input channel (0-12), applied with apply_tdm_conf

RegisterInfo.name: TDM Control Register8

Bits.desc: TDM fsyn dithering mode, applied with apply_ckg_conf
Set TDM fsyn ditering mode, applied with apply_ckg_conf
TDM fsyn polarity
Fsyn low duration in number of bclk (1023-1). Note that it must be lower than the number of bclk inside one fsyn clock cycle. Applied with apply_ckg_conf.
Set the fsyn_freq, fsyn_freq=(pll_clk_freq/tdm_fsyn_rate+4)

RegisterInfo.name: TDM Control Register9

Bits.desc: TDM bclk dithering mode enable, applied with apply_ckg_conf
Set the dithering mode when tdm_bclk_dith is 1.
TDM bclk polarity
Set the bclk_freq, bclk_freq=(pll_clk_freq/tdm_bclk_rate+1)), applied with apply_ckg_conf.

RegisterInfo.name: TDM Control Register10

Bits.desc: TDM output test enable
TDM output test data

RegisterInfo.name: TDM Control Register11

Bits.desc: TDM output test data

RegisterInfo.name: TDM Control Register12

Bits.desc: TDM output test data

RegisterInfo.name: TDM Control Register13

Bits.desc: TDM output test data

RegisterInfo.name: DAC path DSP1 audio processing register. AudioReg1 is [7:0] and AudioReg2 is [15:8]

Bits.desc: Write 1 to enable 3D sound
Write 1 to enable mixing of D1AO1
Write 1 to enable mixing of D1IN4
Write 1 to enable mixing of D1IN3
Write 1 to enable mixing of D1IN2
Write 1 to enable mixing of D1IN1
Write 1 to enable DAC path data mixing at output
Write 1 to enable auto mute
Write 0 to mute and 1 to unmute the DAC side
After updating dac_vol_left and dac_vol_right, write 1 to send the volume command
Write 1 to enable DRC. Look at register 0x52~0x5C for DRC parameters
After updating EQ coefs, write 1 to send the eq update command
Write 1 to enable EQ. Look at registers 0x2E~0x51 for EQ parameters
Write 1 to enable ambient noise cancellation. Look at registers 0x26~0x2D for ANC parameters

RegisterInfo.name: DSP1 Control Register

Bits.desc: Write 1 to enable soft volume ramp and soft mute/unmute ramp. Soft ramp uses zero-crossing detection.
Write 1 to enable DAC mode mode. Left channel = (L+R)/2. Right channel is disabled
Write 1 to enable right channel in DAC path
Write 1 to enable left channel in DAC path

RegisterInfo.name: Volume setting for DSP1

Bits.desc: dB volume setting for left channel in DAC path in 0.5dB step
dB volume setting for right channel in DAC path in 0.5dB step
Digital Gain boost for both Left and Right channel data on playback path
During volume soft ramp amount of time allowed for ramp to complete

RegisterInfo.name: ANC parameter to control LMS adaptation step size

Bits.desc: MSB field of parameter u. Smaller values yields lower residual mean square error.

RegisterInfo.name: ANC parameter to control alpha energy filter

Bits.desc: MSB field of parameter lamba. Smaller values yields smoother energy estimates

RegisterInfo.name: ANC parameter to control xcorr coef calculation

Bits.desc: MSB field of parameter beta. Larger value yields better results.

RegisterInfo.name: ANC parameter to err_th to control double talk detection

Bits.desc: MSB field of parameter err_th

RegisterInfo.name: Scaling coefficient for both left and right channel DAC DSM

Bits.desc: scaling coefficient for left and right channel DAC DSM

RegisterInfo.name: ADC path audio processing register. AudioReg1 = [7:0], AudioReg2 [15:8]

Bits.desc: Write 1 to enable ADC path MIC2 mixing
Write 1 to enable Sound Source Localization
Write 1 to enable Microphone beamforming
Write 1 to enable ADC path MIC1 mixing
Write 1 to enable ADC path LR output mixing
Write 0 - for 2MIC beamforming. 1- for 4MIC beamforming
Write 1 to enable Noise Gate on ADC path
Write 0 to mute and 1 to unmute the ADC(record) path
After updating adc_vol_left and adc_vol_right, write 1 to send the volume command
Write 1 to enable ALC. Look at register 0x76~0x84 for ALC parameters
Write 1 to enable HPF for wind noise reduction
Write 1 to enable AEC

RegisterInfo.name: ADC Control Register

Bits.desc: Write 1 to enable ZCD based soft volume ramp and soft mute/unmute ramp
Write 1 to enable ADC path mono mode operation
Select source data for ADC right channel
Select source data for ADC left channel
Write 1 to enable right channel in ADC path
Write 1 to enable left channel in ADC path

RegisterInfo.name: Volume setting for ADC

Bits.desc: dB volume setting for left channel in ADC path in 0.5dB step
dB volume setting for right channel in ADC path in 0.5dB step
Digital Gain boost for both Left and Right channel data on IN2 of DSP1A
Digital Gain boost for both Left and Right channel data on IN1 of DSP1A
During volume soft ramp amount of time allowed for ramp to complete

RegisterInfo.name: Upper threshold value for ALC engine in ADC path

Bits.desc: MSB field of upper threshold dB value in ALC
LSB field of upper threshold dB value in ALC

RegisterInfo.name: Lower threshold value for ALC engine in ADC path

Bits.desc: MSB field of lower threshold dB value in ALC
LSB field of lower threshold dB value in ALC

RegisterInfo.name: Offset value for ALC engine in ADC path

Bits.desc: MSB field of offset dB value of ALC engine
LSB field of offset dB value of ALC engine

RegisterInfo.name: compression ratio (K:1) for ALC engine in ADC path

Bits.desc: compression ratio value of ALC engine

RegisterInfo.name: Time constant for energy filter in ADC ALC

Bits.desc: MSB field of ALC alpha energy filter time constant
LSB field of ALC alpha energy filter time constant

RegisterInfo.name: Time constant for attack in ADC ALC

Bits.desc: MSB field of ALC attack time constant
LSB field of ALC attack time constant

RegisterInfo.name: Time constant for decay in ADC ALC

Bits.desc: MSB field of ALC decay time constant
LSB field of ALC decay time constant

RegisterInfo.name: Threshold value for Noise Gate in ADC path

Bits.desc: MSB field of NGthreshold dB value
LSB field of NGthreshold dB value

RegisterInfo.name: Mix coefficient for left contribution to left output mix

Bits.desc: Mix coefficient for left contribution to left output mix
Mix coefficient for right contribution to left output mix
Mix coefficient for left contribution to right output mix
Mix coefficient for right contribution to right output mix

RegisterInfo.name: AEC parameter to control LMS adaptation step size

Bits.desc: Parameter u. Smaller values yields lower residual mean square error.

RegisterInfo.name: AEC parameter to control alpha energy filter

Bits.desc: Parameter lamba. Smaller values yields smoother energy estimates

RegisterInfo.name: AEC parameter to control xcorr coef calculation

Bits.desc: Parameter beta. Larger value yields better results.

RegisterInfo.name: AEC parameter to err_th to control double talk detection

Bits.desc: MSB field of parameter err_th

RegisterInfo.name: Lamda parameter for WNR filter

Bits.desc: Equation: =DEC2HEX(MIN(ROUND((VALUE*2^7),0),2^7-1)) VALUE Range: [0.5 1[

RegisterInfo.name: Sound Source Localization parameter mu

Bits.desc: Sound Source Localization parameter mu
Sound Source Localization parameter phi for energy filter

RegisterInfo.name: AMIC to AMIC_DMIC in-Mix

Bits.desc: MIC1 Gain for ADC path in-mix
MIC2 Gain for ADC path in-mix

RegisterInfo.name: BF parameters
BF parameters

RegisterInfo.name: Select data test point to observe on test ports

Bits.desc: Write 1 to enable digital test mux operation
select data point to observe

RegisterInfo.name: Select loopback mode
Delay number in number of samples

Bits.desc: delay buffer length
Source signal for left delay buffer
Source signal for right delay buffer

RegisterInfo.name: DAC speakerphone/earphone controls and miscellaneous
DSP1 information

Bits.desc: user platform information, eden/helan2
MAP hw revision
which DSP inside MAP we are pointing to
major revision is when new features are added
minor revision is when we resolve bugs and issues with existing features

RegisterInfo.name: DSP2 information

Bits.desc: user platform information, eden/helan2
MAP hw revision
which DSP inside MAP we are pointing to
major revision is when new features are added
minor revision is when we resolve bugs and issues with existing features

RegisterInfo.name: DSP1A information

Bits.desc: user platform information, eden/helan2
MAP hw revision
which DSP inside MAP we are pointing to
major revision is when new features are added
minor revision is when we resolve bugs and issues with existing features

RegisterInfo.name: MAP BT mode(WB/NB)

Bits.desc: 1 to enable WB mode, 0 to use NB mode

RegisterInfo.name: DSP output devices(SPKR/HS/EP) switch

Bits.desc: 1 to enable headset/earphone, 0 to disable headset/earphone
1 to enable speaker, 0 to disable speaker

RegisterInfo.name: Digital Gain for NB in Modem

Bits.desc: Increase/Decrease voice stream volume

RegisterInfo.name: Digital Gain WB in Modem

Bits.desc: Increase/Decrease voice stream volume

RegisterInfo.name: Digital Gain for extra NB in Modem

Bits.desc: Increase/Decrease voice stream volume

RegisterInfo.name: Digital Gain for extra WB in Modem

Bits.desc: Increase/Decrease voice stream volume
